code: import React from'react';import classes from'./InitGame.module.css';var initGame=function initGame(props){var players=[];var _loop=function _loop(i){players[i]=React.createElement("div",{className:classes.player},React.createElement("label",{htmlFor:""},React.createElement("p",{classname:classes.p},"Player ",i+1,"'s name"),React.createElement("input",{className:classes.inputName,type:"text",onChange:function onChange(event){props.changeName(event,i);}})));};for(var i=0;i<props.count;i++){_loop(i);}return React.createElement("div",{className:classes.container},players);};export default initGame;
